bib.title: Social recommendations within the multimedia sharing systems
bib.author: Musia{\l}, Katarzyna and Kazienko, Przemys{\l}aw and Kajdanowicz, Tomasz
bib.abstract: The social recommender system that supports the creation of new relations between users in the multimedia sharing system is presented in the paper. To generate suggestions the new concept of the multirelational social network was introduced. It covers both direct as well as object-based relationships that reflect social and semantic links between users. The main goal of the new method is to create the personalized suggestions that are continuously adapted to users' needs depending on the personal weights assigned to each layer from the
